kilomitar 6.83 ka digin yuth diyakadanaya idikirima saha nawa waraya droniya saha samudrika piwisum margaye thanima saha thel nala paddhathiya yali elima.02.paryantha saha anekuth anubaddhitha sewa idikirimaaasiyanu sanwardhana bankuwa ha shri lanka waraya adhikariya eekabaddhawa mulya pahasukam sapayana mema wyapruthiya 2008 wasare aprel masa aarambha kala athara eya masa 48k athulatha awasan kere.danata mema wyapruthiye idikirim katayuthu athurin diyakadanaye idikirim walin palamu mitar 2100 nimakara atha.

paya 2k withara hithe hatiyata nala thibunu gaman widawa nathi karagaththa.niyama wathura tika.thawama pirisidu bawa thiyenawa.kisima kenek palanaya karan naha.tikat ganna oneth naha.habayi api geniyana siyalude aාyi aran eenna mathaka thiyaganna.api widina me parisaraye sundarathwaya mathuparapurata uruma karanna.belimal eekak eehema bila thibunu sithala gathiya nathi karaganna methanin puluwan.kithul hakuru,kithul pani,mi paniwage dewaluth methanin ganna puluwan.mila ganan nam keaෙhamada dannaha.eeth mewage than walin kisiyam deyak miladi ganna purudu wenna.meakada api yana me gamanedi beana belimal eekakin pawulak thama jiwithaya gata gahagannawa.
